Package userinterface

Class GenericDialogScreen

java.lang.Object
userinterface.AbstractFrame
userinterface.GenericDialogScreen
Direct Known Subclasses:
BookmarksDialog, SaveDialog
public abstract class GenericDialogScreen
extends Frame
A class to represent an abstract dialog screen. Examples of implementations are BookmarksDialog and SaveDialog.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class userinterface.Frame

    hasFocus

  • Constructor Details

    • GenericDialogScreen

      public GenericDialogScreen​(int x, int y, int width, int height, Browsr browsr, java.lang.String currentUrl) throws IllegalDimensionException
      Initialise this Frame with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - : The x coordinate of this Frame.
      y - : The y coordinate of this Frame.
      width - : The width of this Frame
      height - : The height of this Frame
      browsr - : The Browsr object associated to this GenericDialogScreen.
      currentUrl - : The URL of the doucment currently displayed in the associated Browsr object.
      Throws:
      IllegalDimensionException

  • Method Details

    • handleKey

      public void handleKey​(int id, int keyCode, char keyChar, int modifiersEx)
      Handle key presses. This method does the right action when a key is pressed.
      Overrides:
      handleKey in class Frame
      Parameters:
      id - : The KeyEvent (Associated with type of KeyEvent)
      keyCode - : The KeyEvent code (Determines the involved key)
      keyChar - : The character representation of the involved key
      modifiersEx - : Specifies other keys that were involved in the event

    • handleResize

      public void handleResize​(int newWindowWidth, int newWindowHeight)
      This method handles resizes of this BookmarksDialog. It makes sure the BookmarksDialog is adjusted in width when the window shrinks or grows. It does not change its height (e.g. look at Firefox).
      Overrides:
      handleResize in class Frame
      Parameters:
      newWindowHeight - : parameter containing the new window-height
      newWindowWidth - : parameter containing the new window-width

    • getBrowsr

      public Browsr getBrowsr()
      Get the Browsr associated to this GenericDialogScreen.
      Returns:
      browsr: The Browsr object associated to this GenericDialogScreen.

    • getCurrentUrl

      public java.lang.String getCurrentUrl()
      Get the URL associated to the currently loaded page.
      Returns:
      url: The URL associated to the currently loaded page.

    • getForm

      public abstract UIForm getForm​(java.lang.String currentUrl)
      Get the contents of this dialog screen.
      Parameters:
      currentUrl - : The URL of the current document displayed in the associated Browsr object.
      Returns:
      form: The UIForm that contains the contents of this dialog screen.

    • getOffset

      public int getOffset()
      Get the offset for the input, text fields and buttons displayed in this BookmarksDialog.
      Returns:
      5: a fixed value of 5.

    • getTextSize

      public int getTextSize()
      Get the text size of the text displayed in this BookmarksDialog.
      Returns:
      14: a fixed value of 14.
